title: Clean, Not Clean
subtle: Concept (fiction), 36 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile 0L
description: There are many things that can be both clean and not clean. Clean, Not Clean uses engaging illustrations to explain when something is clean and when it is not clean. The high-frequency words and repetitive text will support early emergent readers. Students will have the opportunity to compare and contrast information as well as to visualize to better understand the text.
meta: clean, food, hand, not, room, shoe
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast
Complete Sentences : Recognize and use complete sentences
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word not

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
